metadata.Title: CVE-2023-42117 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Exim Improper Neutralization of Special Elements Remote Code Execution Vulnerability]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42117` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exim4 - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
exim4-base - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
exim4-config - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
exim4-daemon-heavy - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
exim4-daemon-light - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
eximon4 - 4.96-14ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: allenpthuang> fixes published, see ZDI's note.

criterions.comment: exim4 package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.96-14ubuntu1.3').
